title: Central arrangements for the delivery of water to the individual plot holder will be made and got ready within six months from the date of sanctioning the layout
clause_text: Central arrangements for the delivery of water to the individual plot holder will be made and got ready within six months from the date of sanctioning the layout. No building shall be used for other than the residential purposes.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Central arrangements for the delivery of water to the individual plot holder will be made and got ready within six months from the date of sanctioning the layout.
